abstract.t: BGP specification [RFC4271] prescribes 'BGP next-hop reachability' as one of the key 'Route Resolvability Condition' that must be satisfied before the BGP bestpath candidate selection. This condition, however, may not be sufficient (as explained in the Appendix section) and desire further granularity. Conventions used in this document In examples, "C:" and "S:" indicate lines sent by the client and server respectively.
